p: In in vivo models of intestinal inflammation, DSS is generally used to stimulate the intestinal epithelial cells of mice [ 70], causing mice to produce various symptoms of intestinal inflammation, such as diarrhoea and granulocyte infiltration. Maqian essential oil can reduce MPO and MMP-9 levels in inflammatory tissues, and its anti-inflammatory activity may be related to the NF- ÎºB signalling pathway.
